settings.title: Settings
settings.temperatureDesc: the higher, the more creative the text is
settings.maxTokenDesc: the max token of the generated text

message.secretKeyUnset: The openAI key has not been set yet, please set it first

tooltip.exceedMaxLimit: The conversation token is about to exceed the maximum chatGPT conversation token (4096), please delete unnecessary conversations as appropriate.

modal.warnBeforeDeleteSession: After the conversation is deleted, it cannot be restored, confirm the deletion?
modal.warnBeforeDeleteChats: Are you sure you want to delete the selected chats?
modal.warnBeforeClearChat: Are you sure you want to clear the conversation?
modal.emptySecretKey: The secret key has not been set yet, do you want to set it now?
modal.emptySecretKeyTips: You need to set up the secret key before you can continue to use it
modal.advancedTip: the following settings are only valid for the current chat

about.softwareDesc: ChatY is an open source GPT desktop client developed based on wails. It may be the most beautiful ChatGPT assistant in your computer
